languages.text: Разведчики фон Валанциус приближаются к монолитам со всей возможной осторожностью, опасаясь появления врага. Небольшой сервитор, отправленный собрать данные об энергетическом луче, наглядно показал разрушительную силу ксеносских технологий, распавшись на мельчайшие частицы при небрежном прикосновении к нему. Удивительно, что вторая пирамида до сих пор цела, а разрушения происходят в источнике луча.

traits.locale_text: Солдаты фон Валанциус приближаются к монолитам со всей возможной осторожностью, опасаясь появления врага. Небольшой сервитор, отправленный собрать данные об энергетическом луче, наглядно показывает разрушительную силу ксеносских технологий, распадаясь на мельчайшие частицы при небрежном прикосновении к нему. Удивительно, что вторая пирамида до сих пор цела, а разрушения происходят в источнике луча.

languages.text: The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths with as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology. After carelessly making contact with the beam, it instantaneously broke apart into minuscule pieces. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and that only matter at the source of the beam is being destroyed.
languages.original_text: Разведчики фон Валанциус приближаются к монолитам со всей возможной осторожностью, опасаясь появления врага. Небольшой сервитор, отправленный собрать данные об энергетическом луче, наглядно показал разрушительную силу ксеносских технологий, распавшись на мельчайшие частицы при небрежном прикосновении к нему. Удивительно, что вторая пирамида до сих пор цела, а разрушения происходят в источнике луча.

traits.locale_text: The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths will as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology after carelessly touching it and falling apart into minuscule pieces on the spot. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and the destruction is happening at the source of the beam.

The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths will as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology after carelessly touching it and falling apart into minuscule pieces on the spot. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and the destruction is happening at the source of the beam.

The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths with as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology. After carelessly making contact with the beam, it instantaneously broke apart into minuscule pieces. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and that only matter at the source of the beam is being destroyed.

The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths with as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology. After carelessly making contact with the beam, it instantaneously broke apart into minuscule pieces. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and that only matter at the source of the beam is being destroyed.

The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths with as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology. After carelessly making contact with the beam, it instantaneously broke apart into minuscule pieces. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and that only matter at the source of the beam is being destroyed.

languages.text: 冯·瓦兰修斯的侦察兵尽可能小心地接近这座巨物，以防敌人突然袭击。某只负责收集能量束数据的小型机仆，清楚地展示了这种异形科技拥有多大的破坏力——这只机仆不小心碰到了光束，随后立刻被分解成了微小的碎片。奇怪的是，被光束照射的另一座金字塔却完好无损，只有位于光束源头处的物体被摧毁了。
languages.original_text: The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths with as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology. After carelessly making contact with the beam, it instantaneously broke apart into minuscule pieces. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and that only matter at the source of the beam is being destroyed.

traits.locale_text: 冯·瓦兰修斯的侦察兵尽可能小心地接近这座巨物，以防敌人突然袭击。某只负责收集能量束数据的小型奴工，清楚地展示了这种异形科技拥有多大的破坏力——这只奴工不小心碰到了光束，随后立刻被分解成了微小的碎片。奇怪的是，被光束照射的另一座金字塔却完好无损，只有位于光束源头处的物体被摧毁了。

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの偵察兵たちは、敵の出現を恐れ、できるだけ慎重にモノリスに近づいていく。エネルギービームに関するデータを収集するために送り込まれた小型のサーヴィターは、この異星技術の破壊力をはっきりと示した。不注意でビームに接触すると、瞬時に極小の破片に分解された。2つ目のピラミッドがまだ無傷であり、ビームの発信源の物質だけが破壊されているとは興味深い。
languages.original_text: The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths with as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology. After carelessly making contact with the beam, it instantaneously broke apart into minuscule pieces. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and that only matter at the source of the beam is being destroyed.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの偵察兵たちは、敵の出現を恐れ、できるだけ慎重にモノリスに近づいていく。エネルギービームに関するデータを収集するために送り込まれた小型のサーヴィターは、この異星技術の破壊力をはっきりと示した。不注意でビームに接触すると、瞬時に極小の破片に分解された。2つ目のピラミッドがまだ無傷であり、ビームの発信源の物質だけが破壊されているとは興味深い。

languages.text: Los exploradores von Valancius se acercan a los monolitos con el mayor cuidado posible, temiendo la aparición de algún enemigo. Un pequeño servidor, enviado para recoger datos sobre el haz de energía, demostró claramente el poder destructivo de esta xenotecnología. Tras entrar en contacto descuidadamente con el haz, se rompió instantáneamente en trozos minúsculos. Es curioso que la segunda pirámide siga intacta y que solo se destruya la materia en la fuente del haz.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths with as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology. After carelessly making contact with the beam, it instantaneously broke apart into minuscule pieces. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and that only matter at the source of the beam is being destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Los exploradores von Valancius se acercan a los monolitos con el mayor cuidado posible, temiendo la aparición de algún enemigo. Un pequeño servidor, enviado para recoger datos sobre el haz de energía, demostró claramente el poder destructivo de esta xenotecnología. Tras entrar en contacto descuidadamente con el haz, se rompió instantáneamente en trozos minúsculos. Es curioso que la segunda pirámide siga intacta y que solo se destruya la materia en la fuente del haz.

languages.text: Die Valancius-Kundschafter nähern sich den Monolithen so vorsichtig wie nur möglich. Sie fürchten, dass Feinde erscheinen könnten. Ein kleiner Servitor, der geschickt wurde, um Daten zu dem Energiestrahl zu sammeln, hat die zerstörerische Gewalt dieser Xenotech eindeutig demonstriert. Er geriet unvorsichtigerweise versehentlich mit dem Strahl in Kontakt und zerbrach augenblicklich in winzige Stücke. Es ist eigenartig, dass die zweite Pyramide noch immer intakt ist, und dass nur Materie an der Quelle des Strahls zerstört wird.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths with as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology. After carelessly making contact with the beam, it instantaneously broke apart into minuscule pieces. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and that only matter at the source of the beam is being destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Die Valancius-Kundschafter nähern sich den Monolithen so vorsichtig wie nur möglich. Sie fürchten, dass Feinde erscheinen könnten. Ein kleiner Servitor, der geschickt wurde, um Daten zu dem Energiestrahl zu sammeln, hat die zerstörerische Gewalt dieser Xenotech eindeutig demonstriert. Er geriet unvorsichtigerweise versehentlich mit dem Strahl in Kontakt und zerbrach augenblicklich in winzige Stücke. Es ist eigenartig, dass die zweite Pyramide noch immer intakt ist, und dass nur Materie an der Quelle des Strahls zerstört wird.

languages.text: Les éclaireurs de von Valancius se rapprochent des monolithes avec circonspection, de crainte qu'un ennemi fasse son apparition. Un petit servitor, déployé pour recueillir des données sur les radiations, apporte par inadvertance une démonstration incontestable de la puissance dévastatrice de cette xénotechnologie. Après avoir malencontreusement touché le rayon, il se fait pulvériser en l'espace d'une fraction de seconde. Curieusement, la seconde pyramide reste intacte et les dégâts demeurent circonscrits à la source du faisceau d'énergie.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths with as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology. After carelessly making contact with the beam, it instantaneously broke apart into minuscule pieces. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and that only matter at the source of the beam is being destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Les éclaireurs de von Valancius se rapprochent des monolithes avec circonspection, de crainte qu'un ennemi fasse son apparition. Un petit servitor, déployé pour recueillir des données sur les radiations, apporte par inadvertance une démonstration incontestable de la puissance dévastatrice de cette xénotechnologie. Après avoir malencontreusement touché le rayon, il se fait pulvériser en l'espace d'une fraction de seconde. Curieusement, la seconde pyramide reste intacte et les dégâts demeurent circonscrits à la source du faisceau d'énergie.

languages.text: Düşmanların belireceğinden korkan von Valancius keşif erleri, monolitlere dikkatle yaklaşıyor. Enerji ışını hakkında veri toplamakla görevlendirilen ufak bir hizmetör, bu zeno teknolojisinin yıkıcı gücünün gözler önüne serilmesine neden oluyor. Işına yanlışlıkla temas etmesiyle birlikte un ufak oluyor. Gariptir ki ikinci piramit sağlam kalıyor ve bir tek ışının kaynağı hasar görüyor.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius scouts approach the monoliths with as much care as possible, fearing the appearance of an enemy. A small servitor, sent to gather data about the energy beam, clearly demonstrated the destructive power of this xenotechnology. After carelessly making contact with the beam, it instantaneously broke apart into minuscule pieces. It is curious that the second pyramid is still intact, and that only matter at the source of the beam is being destroyed.
